short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Records the location of scroll bar of browser, and whenever you need easily relocate to there.
short.zh_CN: 记录滚动条的位置，并可以快速返回到某个记录的位置。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the extension can record the scroll bar position, and whenever you need easily relocate to there.
